China.text: 1860: 11,000 troops sent in to China,whose campaign ended in the capture and control of Peking; 1900- 1901;

Tibet.text: 1856-1857: 5,787 Indian troops contributed to the Chinese War; 1903

Egypt.text: 1882: 9,444 troops and over 1,479,000 rupees contributed in the suppression of rebellion

France.text: 1914: Indian troops rushed to France and Mesopotamia to fight in World War I. More than 1 million Indian soldiers served in World War I as part of the British India Army, and more than 74,000 died in the conflict.

Mesopotamia.text: 1914: Indian troops rushed to France and Mesopotamia to fight in World War I. More than 1 million Indian soldiers served in World War I as part of the British India Army, and more than 74,000 died in the conflict.

Europe.text: Nearly 700,000 Indian sepoys fought in Mesopotamia against the Ottoman empire, Germany’s ally, many of them Indian Muslims taking up arms against their co-religionists in defence of the British empire.

Germany.text: Nearly 700,000 Indian sepoys fought in Mesopotamia against the Ottoman empire, Germany’s ally, many of them Indian Muslims taking up arms against their co-religionists in defence of the British empire.
